services.servicePragraph1: Creation of online stores, integration of e-commerce platforms such as Shopify, WooCommerce.

aboutus.subtitle: HOW I DO MY JOB
aboutus.title: I use my creativity to meet the needs of my clients
aboutus.paragraph: With a focus on quality, usability and performance, I am committed to providing technology solutions that drive the success and satisfaction of my customers.
aboutus.servicePragraph1: I distinguish myself by my focus on writing clean and readable code. I use structured and modular programming practices, which facilitates its understanding and long-term maintenance.
aboutus.servicePragraph2: I seek to balance functionality with aesthetics, making sure that each visual element has a clear purpose and contributes to a smooth user experience.
